title: Guardians of the Galaxy 3 Starts Theatrical Run with Perfectly Balanced Box Office
description:
Even though it probably didn’t feel like it before release, Marvel’s Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3 is finally in theaters. The final installment in James Gunn’s sci-fi comedy series (and his last Marvel movie for the foreseeable future) has had a longer than expected wait, but that hardly seems to matter. With solid…

title: Open Channel: Tell Us What You Thought of Guardians of the Galaxy 3
description:
It’s been six years and a longer than expected wait, but the MCU’s group of sci-fi misfits return with Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3. Famously, the movie was backburnered after the firing of franchise writer/director James Gunn in 2018, followed by his rehiring the following year. During that window where he was no…

title: Netflix's Disenchantment May Live On in Comic Book Form
description:
It may be easy to forget, but Matt Groening’s Disenchantment still exists as one of Netflix’s big adult animated series. While not as big a hit as The Simpsons or Futurama, it seems to have found its own niche over the years and managed to survive Netflix’s multiple cancellation sprees to compete its 40-episode order.…

title: Stranger Things 5 Production Halted as Duffer Bros. Stand with WGA
description:
Production on the fifth and final season of Netflix’s Stranger Things has been paused.

title: AI Has a ‘Free Rider’ Problem
description:
On March 22, 2023, thousands of researchers and tech leaders – including Elon Musk and Apple co-founder Steve Wozniak – published an open letter calling to slow down the artificial intelligence race. Specifically, the letter recommended that labs pause training for technologies stronger than OpenAI’s GPT-4, the most…

title: Online Predators' Favorite Target? Your Kids' Webcams.
description:
There has been a tenfold increase in sexual abuse imagery created with webcams and other recording devices worldwide since 2019, according to the the Internet Watch Foundation.
